Is it true that [imath]0.999999999\dots=1[/imath]?

I'm told by smart people that [imath]0.999999999\dots=1[/imath] and I believe them, but is there a proof that explains why this is? 

__ANSWER__

Given (by long division): [imath]\frac{1}{3} = 0.\bar{3}[/imath] Multiply by 3: [imath]3\times \left( \frac{1}{3} \right) = \left( 0.\bar{3} \right) \times 3[/imath] Therefore: [imath]\frac{3}{3} = 0.\bar{9}[/imath] QED.
